Title: Ruby & Quentin
Writer: Francis Veber (screenplay,  adaptation and dialogue), Serge Frydman (idea)
Actors: Gérard Depardieu, Jean Reno, Richard Berry, André Dussollier
Plot: After hiding his loot and getting thrown in jail, Ruby, a brooding outlaw encounters Quentin, a dim-witted and garrulous giant who befriends him. After Quentin botches a solo escape attempt, they make a break together. Unable to shake the clumsy Quentin Ruby is forced to take him along as he pursues his former partners in crime to avenge the death of the woman he loved and get to the money before they do.
Production: DD Productions, Filmauro, Efve Films, Union Générale Cinématographique (UGC), TF1 Films Production
